title: Does Interface settings increase/descrease performance(FPS)
body: I want to know if the interface settings(in-game) interact/change the performance(FPS).

replies.body: Not really, changing your hub and in-game interface won't really impact your experience.  Video settings, might though.  If you want to tune up your FPS, try out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  It will have some steps like updating your drivers to make sure your game is in good health.  I hope that helps!
